 Entertainment

We provide a selection of entertainment to help make your experience at the beer and cider festival a memorable one. What do we have?

A purpose-built entertainment tent for live music

See the line up of music acts taking place at the festival stage tent this year

Family Fun Day on Saturday from 12pm to 5pm

Find out more about the family fun day

Axe throwing from the Flying Iron Company New for 2019

Learn more about the axe throwing experience

Salsa and dancing on our opening night New for 2019

Get the details about the salsa dancing experience at the summer festival


 Activities



Visit Flying Iron Co. Axe Throwing website

Flying Iron Co. Axe Throwing New for 2019

Splittin’ Timber at events and festivals across the UK!

What started out as a few friends messing around in the back garden with a homemade target and a few old axes found in the shed, soon grew into a small business. In a short space of time we have grown rapidly and now have three mobile axe throwing trailer set ups and several staff members and attend some of the biggest events/festivals in the UK. We turn any event into an Axe-travaganza!

Like Flying Iron Co. on Facebook  Follow Flying Iron Co. on Instagram


Family Fun Day on Saturday 6th 12 noon to 5pm

Bring the young children to the park and go on the rides. Enjoy face painting, a coconut shy and ice cream van. Soft drinks are available.
